creator: markt@apache.org
text:
Thanks for the report and and suggested fix. I ended up applying a slightly broader patch that remove a couple of unnecessary lines as well.

This has been fixed in trun, 8.0.x (for 8.0.27 onwards) and 7.0.x (for 7.0.65 onwards).
